item.title: Redis Horizontal Scaling Overview
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Redis Horizontal Scaling This guide will give an overview on how KubeDB Enterprise operator scales up or down of Redis cluster database for both the number of replicas and masters. Before You Begin You should be familiar with the following KubeDB concepts: Redis RedisOpsRequest How Horizontal Scaling Process Works The following diagram shows how KubeDB Enterprise operator scales up or down Redis database components.
